    1. changePassword(User, PasswordService, PasswordUI)

Interface PasswordChanger

All Known Implementing Classes:
ApplicantUI, HDBManagerUI, HDBOfficerUI
public interface PasswordChanger
Interface defining the contract for password change functionality.

Provides a default implementation for changing a user's password, including user interaction, password policy validation, and confirmation. The interface expects implementations to provide a PasswordService for business logic and a PasswordUI for user interaction.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default void
    changePassword(User currentUser, PasswordService passwordService, PasswordUI ui)
    Initiates the password change process for the specified user.

  • Method Details

    • changePassword

      default void changePassword(User currentUser, PasswordService passwordService, PasswordUI ui)
      Initiates the password change process for the specified user.

      The process includes:

      • Prompting the user for their current password and verifying it
      • Displaying password policy requirements
      • Prompting for a new password and confirmation
      • Validating the new password against the policy
      • Attempting to update the password via the provided PasswordService
      • Providing success or error feedback via the PasswordUI
      If the user cancels at any stage, the process is aborted.

      Parameters:
      currentUser - the User whose password is to be changed
      passwordService - the PasswordService handling password updates and validation
      ui - the PasswordUI for user interaction
